column1: #Text=Požarevac is a city in Central Serbia .
#Text=It is about 75 km away from Serbian capital , Belgrade .
#Text=Belgrade International Airport is about 100km away from Požarevac .
#Text=You can reach Požarevac by rented car , taxi or by bus from Belgrade bus station .
#Text=From Belgrade there is a regular bus transport every hour .
#Text=The most popular way for local transport is taxi or you can rent a car .
#Text=Barili 's paintings collected from all over the world .
#Text=Barili was one of the well known painters in the world in 19th century .
#Text=Artifacts from Požarevac 's history , many of them dating from the Roman Empire .
#Text=Small park on the edge of Požarevac .
#Text=Many exotic plants and birds can be seen here .
#Text=An ancient Roman city and military camp , which used to be the capital of Moesia Superior province , on the Roman road Via Militaris .
#Text=At its peak , it is believed to have had 40,000 inhabitants , making it one of the biggest cities of that time .
#Text=Viminacium was devastated by Huns in the 5th century , later rebuilt by Justinian , and completely destroyed with the arrival of Slavs in the 6th century .
#Text=Today , the archaeological site occupies a total of 450 hectares ; as of 2018 , only 3 to 4 % of the site have been explored .
#Text=In 2019 , excavations revealed a well preserved 1.78 m tall skeleton buried with a 92 cm long iron sword .
#Text=Some of the most popular discoteques are Madona and Rolex .
#Text=Arrange a picnic on National Park ' Čačalica ' , five minutes drive from downtown .
#Text=Oaza ( On the road to Silver lake . ) .
#Text=Popular restaurant in Požarevac , serving Italian , French and Serbian cuisine
#Text=National cuisine , quite and peaceful restaurant located in one of the oldest streets in Požarevac .
#Text=Very interesting restaurant where you will be served by prisoners from local prison .
#Text=But do n't be afraid , they are not dangerous , you will be safe and will enjoy it .
#Text=All of these restaurants serves delicious meals at affordable prices - from 10 - 25€ ( meal and one drink ) .
#Text=One of the most popular cafes for locals .
#Text=2 star hotel near the most frequent street .
#Text=Quite and peaceful hotel , five minutes drive from Požarevac .
#Text=Hotel Srerbno jezero ( Srebrno jezero , near Silver lake ) .
#Text=Peaceful and quite place during the non summer months .
